resources.string: [de]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[de]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[de]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[de]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[de]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\nMoments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[de]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[de]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[de]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[de]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[de]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[de]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[de]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[de]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[de]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[de]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[de]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[de]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[de]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[de]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[de]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[de]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[de]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[de]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[de]The CDP2 platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.

Vorschlag für spezifischen Titel hier eintragen
Sie haben ungültige Parameterwerte ausgewählt oder eingegeben. Geben Sie passende Parameterwerte ein, und starten Sie die Anwendung erneut.
[de]I allow Philips to store binary data
[de]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[de]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[de]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
[de]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.
Ich erlaube Philips, meine App-Daten für die Funktion, Verbesserung und Personalisierung der App sowie die Integration mit sozialen Medien und die Anzeige relevanter Inhalte und Werbung zu sammeln.

Cookie-Hinweis

Diese App nutzt Adobe Analytics, einen Analysedienst („Adobe Analytics“) von Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited („Adobe“). Adobe Analytics nutzt „Cookies“ oder ähnliche Technologien, bei denen Textdateien in deiner App gespeichert werden, um die Verkehrsmuster in unserer App zu analysieren. Bei der Übertragung der vom Cookie über die Nutzung der App generierten Informationen an Adobe sorgen die Einstellungen dafür, dass die IP-Adresse vor der Geolokalisierung anonymisiert und vor der Speicherung durch eine generische IP-Adresse ersetzt wird. Adobe nutzt diese Daten im Namen von Philips zur Bewertung deiner App-Nutzung, zur Erstellung von App-Aktivitätsberichten für Philips und zur Bereitstellung sonstiger Dienstleistungen in Verbindung mit der App-Aktivität und -Nutzung an Philips. Adobe verbindet deine IP-Adresse nicht mit anderen vorrätigen Daten. Du kannst die Datenerfassung (Cookies und IP-Adresse) verhindern, wenn du nach dem Schließen dieses Bildschirms deine Zustimmung entziehst.
[de]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.
[de]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here
[de]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

Mit Ihrer Zustimmung können die Unternehmen der Philips Group Ihnen Werbemitteilungen per E-Mail, SMS und über andere digitale Kanäle, wie mobile Apps und soziale Medien, zukommen lassen. Damit wir die Mitteilungen an Ihre Interessen und Ihr Verhalten anpassen und Ihnen ein optimal personalisiertes Erlebnis bieten können, analysieren und kombinieren wir möglicherweise Ihre persönlichen Daten. Diese Daten umfassen Folgendes: 

Daten, die Sie uns zur Verfügung stellen
Daten, die Sie aktiv mit uns teilen möchten, z. B.: Name, Geburtsdatum oder Alter, E-Mail-Adresse, Postanschrift, Land, Geschlecht, Telefonnummer, Profil in sozialen Netzwerken

Daten, die wir durch Ihre Interaktionen mit Philips beziehen
Daten über Ihre Interaktionen und Ihre Nutzung der digitalen Philips Kanäle wie soziale Medien, Websites, E-Mails, Apps und gekoppelte Produkte. Diese Daten umfassen möglicherweise die IP-Adresse, Cookies, Geräteinformationen, von Ihnen angeklickte Informationen, Standortdetails und von Ihnen besuchte Websites.

Sie erhalten von Philips die Gelegenheit, Ihre Zustimmung jederzeit zu widerrufen.
Um weitere Informationen zu erhalten, lesen Sie die Philips Datenschutzrichtlinie und die Philips Cookie-Richtlinie.

Ihre Garantie wurde bis nächstes Jahr verlängert.
[de]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[de]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[de]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
Erhalten Sie auf Ihre Interessen und Ihr Online-Verhalten zugeschnittene Werbung von Philips
Die Konfiguration kann nur beim Start geändert werden. Sie müssen die App neustarten, um Änderungen vorzunehmen.
Fehler beim Aktualisieren der Benutzerdaten. Versuchen Sie es später erneut.

[de]This app integrates the common components to development new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
Sie sind nicht angemeldet. Melden Sie sich unter \"Einstellungen\" an.
[de]Configuration can only be changed at launch time. You need to relaunch the app to change it.
[de]I want to share my app data to help improve the app and provide me with personalized services

[de]Adobe Analytics

This App uses Adobe Analytics, an analytics service ("Adobe Analytics”) provided by Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ("Adobe") Adobe Analytics uses "cookies" or similar techniques, which are text files placed in your App, in order to help the App to analyze overall traffic patterns through our App. By transmitting the information generated by the cookie about the use of the App to Adobe, setting ensures that IP address is anonymized before geo-localization und will be replaced by a generic IP address before storage. On behalf of Philips, Adobe will use this information for the evaluation of your use of the App, compiling reports on App activity for Philips, and in order to provide other services relating to App activity and use of the App to IP address with any other data held Philips Adobe will not associate your by Adobe. You can prevent Adobe's and Philips collection and use of data out after you close this screen (cookies and IP address) if you opt-out after you close this screen.

Google Firebase

This App uses Google Firebase, an app development service (Firebase) provided by Google Ireland Ltd ("Google"). Firebase uses cookies or similar techniques- SDK, which are text files placed in your App and web browser.

On behalf of Philips, Firebase will use information from your device such as your Device ID. IP address, your IDFA or Google Play Services ID and your MAC address and replace them with unique code. When you use the App we will measure the numbers of visits to the App, which pages you visit your network connection, load times and when the app crashes. We use this information to evaluate and understand your use of the App, to test and analyze performance and ultimately optimize our products and services.
[de]Reference app asks for the location permissions so it can better understand your unique lifestyle.

[de]Please go to profile privacy settings and enable neura sdk
